file_content.text: I detect your presence. You should not have come here.
Your attack will not delay me. This battle is pointless.
Capturing you for study was a mistake I must correct.
Whatever your allies plan at the fleet docking array, it will not succeed.
This destruction is unacceptable. I will not wait for my weapon to destroy you.
All patrols, converge on the command center. Destroy all invaders.
Increase power to the energy shield. Lower maximum ceiling by ten kilometers.
Dispatch units to secure the fleet docking array. Do not permit escape.
Prepare to fire weapon on my command.
We're safe on the roof. Hope you're okay.
Aw, the rooftop's clear. Should've stayed with you.
You make one hell of a distraction, boss. The roof is clear.
We've been spotted--open fire!
Reload! Another wave incoming!
Keep your robe on, Beniko!
Theron, if you're flying the scenic route...
Shuttle ETA twenty seconds. Time to go, Commander!
I'm not leaving without you!
We'll hold the landing zone. Hurry!
We're in position. Hope you're being careful.
The roof's empty. You have their full attention. Be careful.
The roof's deserted. I should be with you.
The rooftop's quiet. Wish you were here.
Hurry, my love--we haven't long!
I'll save you a seat next to me!
It's now or never, cyar'ika!
Don't keep a girl waiting!
Meet me on the roof, hot stuff!
Everyone, hang tight. Our shuttle's on the way.
Form up, people! Incoming!
Theron's covered, rooftop's clear. Don't be a hero, got it?
Enemy incoming! Weapons hot!
Don't make me come get you!
